job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Data Engineer and Tech Lead to join us in Amsterdam. As an engineer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines to process transactional and other data. You will collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts in developing and maintaining data solutions and INGA's data architecture to support the next generation of products and data initiatives. As a tech lead, collaborate with product manager on the product roadmap, translate requirements into feasible technical solutions, ensure that the team follows (engineering) best practices, lead tech & architectural decisions, and establish the team's culture and way-of-working.

   We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills. We hire people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time in Amsterdam. Come join us!
job_details.full_text:
Lead Senior Data Engineer

We are looking for a Data Engineer and Tech Lead to join us in Amsterdam. As an engineer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines to process transactional and other data. You will collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts in developing and maintaining data solutions and INGA's data architecture to support the next generation of products and data initiatives. As a tech lead, collaborate with product manager on the product roadmap, translate requirements into feasible technical solutions, ensure that the team follows (engineering) best practices, lead tech & architectural decisions, and establish the team's culture and way-of-working.

   We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills. We hire people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time in Amsterdam. Come join us!

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes data engineering and traditional software engineering leadership, with no mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related technologies. While it mentions collaboration with data scientists, the core responsibilities and required skills do not align with the specialized profiles of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines to process transactional and other data
developing and maintaining data solutions and INGA's data architecture
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly describe the core activities of building and managing data infrastructure and pipelines.

phrases: translate requirements into feasible technical solutions
ensure that the team follows (engineering) best practices
lead tech & architectural decisions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases relate to the application of engineering principles to build and guide the development of technical solutions and systems.

phrases: collaborate with product manager on the product roadmap
translate requirements into feasible technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to understand business goals and translate them into technical plans and solutions.

phrases: Lead Senior Data Engineer
Tech Lead
lead tech & architectural decisions
establish the team's culture and way-of-working
job_tasks.justification: The 'Lead' and 'Tech Lead' titles, along with responsibilities for decision-making and team culture, suggest a high degree of ownership and initiative.

phrases: curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills
support them throughout their time in Amsterdam
job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions a commitment to learning and skill development.

phrases: collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts
collaborate with product manager
job_tasks.justification: The role requires working closely with other teams and individuals to achieve project goals.

phrases: committed to developing themselves and learning new skills
collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts
collaborate with product manager
Lead Senior Data Engineer
Tech Lead
lead tech & architectural decisions
establish the team's culture and way-of-working
translate requirements into feasible technical solutions
